Package network.socket.server

Class ServerNetworkSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.socket.server.ServerNetworkSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, ServerInterface, RequestHandler
    public class ServerNetworkSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestHandler, ServerInterface
    This class handles all the methods called by the Server(implemented in Serverinterface) and the Requests called by the clients (implemented in RequestHandler)
